sklite.lib.abstract module¶

Implements all the general functionality which all models should inherit for IO operations.

@TODO: name might be misleading, change it.

class sklite.lib.abstract.Abstract¶

Bases: object

Inherit this class wherever a save method should exist.

build(self)¶

All inherited classes should implement a build method.

static get_home_dir() → str¶

Fetches the path to the .sklite in your home directory and creates it if it doesn’t exist.

Returns
str
save(self, path, indent=None, force_override=False) → None¶

Saves the generated dict into a JSON file.

Parameters
pathstr

Path to the output file.

indentint|None

Add indentation or keep the JSON compressed.

force_overridebool

Override an existing model if it exists.

Returns
None

sklite.lib.exceptions module¶

Exception classes for sklite.

exception sklite.lib.exceptions.ClassMismatchException¶

Bases: Exception

Used when a wrong estimator is passed.

exception sklite.lib.exceptions.ClassNotFitted¶

Bases: Exception

Used when a classifier which hasn’t been fitted was passed to the constructor.

exception sklite.lib.exceptions.FileExists¶

Bases: Exception

Used when a file exists with the samr filename

exception sklite.lib.exceptions.ImplementationException¶

Bases: Exception

Used when a sklite.models.* class hasn’t been properly implemented.

exception sklite.lib.exceptions.ReservedProperty¶

Bases: Exception

Used when trying to set a property which is internally used by sklite.

exception sklite.lib.exceptions.UnsupportedModel¶

Bases: Exception

Used when a sklearn model, unsupported in sklite has been passed to the constructor.
